items.sentence: I wanted to say something, but I was too scared.
I was amazed that she had drunk all of the wine.
I was born on the twenty-second of June in 1974.
I was studying French when you called yesterday.
Tom drinks 100% pure orange juice every morning.
How did you know Tom was planning on doing that?
How long did it take you to translate this book?
How old were your kids when you moved to Boston?
I admire a person who expresses a frank opinion.
I advise you to do whatever Tom tells you to do.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who wasn\'t doing that.
Tom wondered when you bought your tennis racket.
Tom wondered where Mary had spent her childhood.
Tom worked for a construction company in Boston.
Tom works hard, so his parents are proud of him.
The last thing I\'d ever want to do is hurt Tom.
It doesn\'t necessarily mean that you\'re right.
We couldn\'t have done that without Tom\'s help.
Tom and Mary don\'t go to the movies very often.
Perhaps Tom is too old to do this kind of thing.
